uvi.product_version: versions from v2.6.32 to before v4.9.276
uvi.description:
media: zr364xx: fix memory leak in zr364xx_start_readpipe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.276 by commit bbc80a972a3c5d7eba3f6c9c07af8fea42f5c513, it was introduced in version v2.6.32 by commit ccbf035ae5de4c535160fc99f73feb44cc55b534. For more details please see the references link.
